```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
fx <- expression(x^2)
d_fx <- D(expr = fx, name = "x")
x = 3
eval(d_fx)
```

```{r}
Pa <- expression(2 * (3*a+2)^4 - 5)
d_Pa <- D(expr = Pa, name = "a")
a = 1.2
eval(d_Pa)
```
